abstract: Philip D Murphy, former United States ambassador to Germany, announces that he will run for governor of New Jersey in 2017.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Murphy, a Democrat, became the first official candidate in what is expected to be a crowded race to succeed Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey.

headline.main: Philip Murphy, Ex-U.S. Ambassador, Enters Race to Replace Christie

snippet: Mr. Murphy, a Democrat, became the first official candidate in what is expected to be a crowded race to succeed Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey.
